title: 怎么调整登录时间啊
author: 歪氏

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
打开Authme
打开config
搜索   timeout
设置为120

  timeout: 120

即可
求最佳

replies.author: 歪氏
replies.txt_content:
qq1812538626 发表于 2015-12-18 19:24
打开Authme
打开config
搜索   timeout
没有这个东西啊

replies.author: xRPQx
replies.txt_content:
歪氏 发表于 2015-12-18 19:35
没有这个东西啊
你的登录插件是什么？~

replies.author: Mrding
replies.txt_content:
Mrding 发表于 2015-12-19 13:15
kickNonRegistered: false
    kickOnWrongPassword: false
    teleportUnAuthedToSpawn: false
如果你不是authme插件，请和我说一下

replies.author: Mrding
replies.txt_content:
kickNonRegistered: false
    kickOnWrongPassword: false
    teleportUnAuthedToSpawn: false
    minNicknameLength: 3
    allowMovement: false
    timeout: 30    （在此处调节即可）
    allowedNicknameCharacters: ............
    allowedMovementRadius: 100
    enablePasswordVerifier: true
    ProtectInventoryBeforeLogIn: true
    displayOtherAccounts: true
    ForceSpawnOnTheseWorlds:
